name: Clothing and shoe store
description: Clothing store developed with React and styled components, connected to a backend developed with Node.js that allows user registration and processes their orders using Stripe.

name: Github user finder
description: It is an application that provides information of a github user if you search for him by his username.

name: Password generator
description: Project that generates random passwords with character options that the user can choose.

name: To-Do List
description: In this project the user can create and save a list of tasks, to save the tasks the localStorage of the browser is used.

name: Pokedex
description: App where you can find your favorite pokemons brought from the pokeapi.
